adjective.description: Befitting or characteristic of a lady; noble; ladylike.

adverb.description: In a manner befitting or characteristic of a lady; in a noble or ladylike way.

origin: Late Middle English; earliest use found in Pearl. From lady + -ly. In later use probably after lordly, gentlemanly<br>Middle English; earliest use found in Ancrene Riwle. From lady + -ly.
